page.title: 16Leisure Activity
page.content: {MY COLLECTION OF DOLLS. I collect dolls from around the world because I like their dresses and they are not too expensive.I have 14 dolls, 3 Spanish,5 French,1 Dutch,1 Austrian, 2 Italian and 2 American. My Paris doll looks like this: It has a red hat and dress,in the hat is a white fluffy feather.The dress has a picture of the Eiffel Tower and a yellow ribbon in a bow at the back. All my dolls are kept in a display cabinet in my bedroom. {BMX BIKES. A BMX is a light weight bike,it is stronger than other bikes because of the things it does.You have to wear special clothes with padding,a crash helmet and boots.The bikes do tricks like an{Aerial}where you ride up a ramp very fast and turn in mid-air. They also do free styling.
